title: Target | Sr. Engineer | Bengaluru | Advice Needed
content:
Education: Bachelors in Computer Engineering (Tier - 3)
Years of Experience: 3.10 Years
Prior Experience: Product Based Company in Pune
Previous Salary : 16L Base + 2L Variable
Date of the Offer: Sept 2024
Company: Target
Title/Level: Sr. Engineer
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: INR 30L
Bonus: INR 3L Variable Pay
Relocation: Flights + Hotels + 50k
Joining Bonus : 1L
Benefits : Mediclaim, Term Life Insurance, Food, Transportation, Gym etc
Total CTC (Salary + Bonus): 33L

Advice Needed : I have accepted an offer from Goldman Sachs with same CTC of 33L (28L Fixed + 5L Variable). Can I renegotiate with Goldman Sachs to increase the base salary even if I have accepted the offer letter? Will Goldman Sachs agree to increase the base? Which one should I be more inclined towards? Should I regotiate with Target before accepting the offer letter?

title: Motive | SDE | Remote
content:
Education: Tier 3
Years of Experience: 3
Prior Experience: Small startup
Current Comp : 18 LPA

Company: Motive
Title/Level: SDE
Location: Remote
Salary: 20 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: N/A
Stock bonus: 4000 RSUs vested over 4 years (25% each year)
Bonus: NA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 20 LPA + RSUs
Benefits: ₹1000 monthly gym reimbursement + ₹2500 monthly wifi reimbursement + ₹30,000 one time allowance for home setup + covered health/dental/vision insurance
Other details: They took more than 2 months to revert with the offer, I was at 13 LPA at the time of interviews which has now increased to 18 LPA starting from Sept. They are not ready to negotiate at all even though I have an offer of 27 LPA.

Will try to get the base up to 24-25 atleast otherwise will pass. Not interested in the 27LPA org at all.

title: Intuit | Software Engineer 1 | Offcampus | Bangalore
content:
**Education**: B. Tech. in CSE (Tier 2)
**Years of Experience**: 0
**Prior Experience**: 6 month intern at an MNC.
**Date of the Offer**: July 2024
**Company**: Intuit
**Title/Level**: Software Engineer 1
**Location**: Bangalore

---

**Salary**: ₹20.5L
**Bonus**: Performance bonus up to 10% of base ~₹2.05L
**Signing Bonus**: ₹3.5L
**Stock Bonus**: $23.1k over 3.5 years (4.84L - First vesting within 6 months)

Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): **~₹31L **
Total CTC: ~₹46L

Benefits: 
https://www.intuitbenefits.com/in
Relocation benefits include 1 month of hotel stay (for you as well as two dependents), 1 month of cab service for you (100 km /10 hours each day), home search assistance, movement of goods / vehicle, etc.

Other details: Applied through an unofficial referral (google form). The whole interview process finished in about a week including the OA and 2 rounds of interviews.
